channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 15:42 Air alarm to Donetsk Region follow the following messages.
item.description: 游댮 15:42 Air alarm to Donetsk Region follow the following messages.#Donetsk_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游댮 15:41 The threat of shelling! Now in Pokrovskaya territorial community artillery shelling. Put in shelter!
item.description: 游댮 15:41 The threat of shelling! Now in Pokrovskaya territorial community artillery shelling. Put in shelter!#Pokrovskaya_ territorial This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 15:10 Auxiliary in Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that anxiety is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community-Mirovskaya territorial community- Pokrovskaya Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 15:10 Auxiliary in Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that anxiety is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community-Mirovskaya territorial community- Pokrovskaya Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
